DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine clopidogrel inhibit hepatic uptake transport rosuvastatin clinically .
DOC.criteria: Healthy individual , male female , age 1865 year old , current medical condition active diagnosis determine study doctor base history , physical exam laboratory evaluation Subjects take medication 2 week prior study time course study include prescription medication , overthecounter medication ( except acetaminophen ) , dietary supplement , drug abuse Subjects SLCO1B1*1A genotype Subjects able maintain adequate birth control study independent hormonal contraceptive use Subjects able abstain grapefruit , grapefruit juice , orange juice , caffeinated beverage and/or alcoholic beverage 3 pm day study completion study day . Participants determine normal liver kidney function measure baseline BMI 18.5 30 kg/m2 Subjects capable fast food beverage least 8 hour prior medication dose Be able read , speak , understand English Subjects active medical problem Subjects chronic prescription OTC medication stop 2 week prior study . Subjects incapable multiple blood draw ( HCT < 30 mg/dL ) Subjects history rhabdomyolysis Subjects history drugrelated myalgias Subjects history diagnosis hemorrhagic tendency blood dyscrasias Subjects history GI bleed peptic ulcer disease Subjects recent history trauma Subjects recent history upcoming plan surgery Subjects smoke tobacco ongoing alcohol illegal drug use Subjects pregnant , lactating , try conceive study period Subjects allergic rosuvastatin clopidogrel know component medication
